structure.unit: ARTICLE CLVIII. THREE LAKES APARTMENTS MULTIPURPOSE MAINTENANCE SPECIAL TAXING DISTRICT

text.section: The County Mayor or County Mayor's designee is authorized and directed to cause to be made the maintenance and operation of various public improvements to be installed within the proposed district in accordance with the provisions of this Ordinance. However, multipurpose maintenance services will be provided by the taxing district in accordance with the provisions of this Ordinance only if an association and, if applicable, a community development district, have failed to provide these maintenance services and the County has adopted this proposed district's multipurpose maintenance assessment roll.
